info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Caldwell and east central Burke Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lenoir, or near Cajah`s Mountain, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Gamewell, Hudson, Cajah`s Mountain, Connelly Springs, Rutherford College, Lake Rhodhiss and Valdese. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
